title: Rek'sai tremor sense and Teamates
body: I like playing Rek'Sai a lot, ever since i learned to use tremor sense properly I feel blind playing other champions. My only issue is that i can't warn teammates fast enough when i see something in the bush they are about to walk into. Do any experienced rek'sai players encounter this issue and how did you get around it?

replies.body: it would be cool if it made a ripple on the mini map if you see them moving
Allies can see the ripples though, so what more do you want? You shouldn't have to warn allies at all.
They can? then why do they walk around like headless chickens. This is the first time I've heard of that
